```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(leaflet)
```


```{r}
#| label: data-download
#| message: false 

la_bachelor_degrees <- get_acs(
    geography = "tract",
    variables = "DP02_0068P",
    state = "CA",
    county = "Los Angeles",
    survey = "acs5",
    year = 2021,
    geometry = TRUE,
    progress = FALSE
)
```

```{r}

pal <- colorNumeric(
    palette = "viridis",
    domain = la_bachelor_degrees$estimate
)

# Create the leaflet map
leaflet(la_bachelor_degrees) %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addPolygons(
        fillColor = ~pal(estimate),
        weight = 1,
        opacity = 1,
        color = "white",
        dashArray = "3",
        fillOpacity = 0.7,
        highlight = highlightOptions(
            weight = 3,
            color = "#666",
            dashArray = "",
            fillOpacity = 0.7,
            bringToFront = TRUE
        ),
        label = ~paste0(NAME, ": ", estimate, "%"),
        labelOptions = labelOptions(
            style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
            textsize = "15px",
            direction = "auto"
        )
    ) %>%
    addLegend(
        pal = pal,
        values = ~estimate,
        opacity = 0.7,
        title = "Percentage with Bachelor's Degree",
        position = "bottomright"
    )
```
